trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnClickEventArgs> class provides the zero-based index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> class of the column that is clicked in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnClickEventArgs>類別會提供內以零為起始的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>按一下中的資料行的類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can use this information in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick> event to determine which column is being clicked to perform tasks on the data within the column.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這項資訊中的事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>事件，以判斷資料行中資料上執行工作，在按下哪個資料行。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `ListView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>名為`ListView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the column that is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 按一下資料行之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnClickEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnClickEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based index of the column that is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 取得所按下資料行之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection" /> of the column that is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在按一下資料行之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection" /> 內以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: You can use the information provided by this property in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick> event to determine which column is being clicked to perform tasks on the data within the column.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性中的事件處理常式所提供的資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>事件，以判斷資料行中資料上執行工作，在按下哪個資料行。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `ListView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>名為`ListView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
